song_name: Feels So Good (Show Me Your Love)
lyrics:
OH SHOW ME YOUR LOVE
OH SHOW ME YOUR LOVE
OH SHOW ME YOUR LOVE
OH SHOW ME YOUR LOVE

IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD 
IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD

SHOW ME,SHOW ME THAT YOU LOVE ME
SHOW ME,SHOW ME THAT YOU WANT LOVE
SHOW ME,SHOW ME THAT YOU NEED ME
SHOW ME,SHOW ME THAT YOU WANT MY LOVE

IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD
ALL I KNOW
IT FEELS SO GOOD KNOWING THAT YOUR MINE
ALL I WANT IS TO HAVE YOU ALL THE TIME

MY LOVE FOR YOU GROWS STRONGER EVERYDAY

ALL I KNOW
IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD

OH SHOW ME YOUR LOVE
OH SHOW ME YOUR LOVE
OH SHOW ME YOUR LOVE
OH SHOW ME YOUR LOVE

BABY,BABY,BABY
IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD
IT FEELS SO GOOD
